content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 5 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Border Collie. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Border Collie, the elements on the path are a bagel, a golf ball, an upright piano, and a chambered nautilus. Starting from the golf ball, you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the golf ball, you move 3 steps counter-clockwise. This brings you to the upright piano. Then, you move 5 steps clockwise. This takes you back to the golf ball. However, since you have already been at the golf ball, you are now back where you started. Therefore, you will find a golf ball again.

Starting from the chambered nautilus, you move around the ring by 3 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the chambered nautilus, you move 3 steps clockwise. This brings you to the upright piano. Then, you move 5 steps counter-clockwise. This takes you back to the golf ball. Therefore, you will find a golf ball again.
